text: thumb|right|200px|Bonagura in 1961 Gianni Bonagura (27 October 1925 â€“ 8 October 2017) was an Italian movie, stage, television, radio star, and a voice actor. He appeared in 40 movies between 1950 and 2001. He was born in Milan, Italy. He was known for his role of Dr. Watson in the 1968 RAI television series Sherlock Holmes. Bonagura died in Milan on 8 October 2017 at the age of 91.The actor Gianni Bonagura died, the face of the Italian comedy ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Radio actors Category:Actors from Milan
